## Install RMySQL package to connect to MYSQL DBMS

 

```{r pkg-RMariaDB}
#install.packages("RMariaDB")
library(DBI)
```

## Create a Database Connection object 

```{r dbconn-con, echo=FALSE}
con <- dbConnect(RMySQL::MySQL(),
                 dbname = "movies",
                 
                 host = "localhost",
                 port = 3306,
                 user="root",
                 password="P!kc7Hs}&8m>R&(U")
```

## List the tables in movies database
```{r movies-tables}
dbListTables(con)
```

## Read and display the contents of each table in the movies database
```{r}
dbReadTable(con,"movies")
dbReadTable(con,"gross")
dbReadTable(con,"ratings")
dbReadTable(con,"theaters")
dbReadTable(con,"dates")
```
